p: The geographical extent of the YF outbreak in 2017 to 2018 is shown in Fig.Â 1. Epizootics have been reported in NHPs in these regions. However, in the last decades, virus circulation and NHP epizootics from YFV were not detected in these areas except for MG, which has shown epizootics of NHPs and disease outbreaks since 2000.
